content: materials - color a 1 skein of cascade s eco duo each skein is 197 yards/ 100 grams approximately 197 yards required i used the color chicory - color b 1 skein of cascade s eco duo approximately 197 yards required i used the color zebra - us 8 5 mm 8-inch 12-inch or 16-inch circular needles 1 or long double pointed needes 2 - 1 pack of buttons i used small buttons ⅜-inch 2-hole size 15 in color black gauge 20 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished length 68 inches long designed by purl soho designer laura ferguson 3 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/
